arts.ttl: Napoli vs. Eintracht Frankfurt: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt travel to defending Serie A champions Napoli on Tuesday after making a rollercoaster start to their 2025/26 UEFA Champions League campaign (kick-off: 6.45pm CET). Eintracht go into the match one spot above Napoli in the league phase table in 22nd, with both teams on three points, but Frankfurt having a slightly better goal difference.

arts.ttl: Why Eintracht Frankfurt will beat Napoli in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt will continue their UEFA Champions League campaign with a trip to Napoli on Tuesday evening (kick-off: 6.45pm CEST). The 25-year-old has filled the hole left by the outgoing Hugo Ekitiké, hitting his stride after a slow start by scoring nine in his last nine matches for his club in all competitions – three of those coming in the Champions League alone.
